2004.title: First meeting with computer
2004.text: Instantly fall in love with the notion of making computer do things the way I want.

2008.title: Won a quiz
2008.text: Participated in a Quiz, learned C, and C++ for free.

2010.title: Intermediate School
2010.text: Passed with the mix feelings, Computers was still the passion.

2014.title: Passed college
2014.text: Lots of fond memory of college days

2014.title: 2nd Best project in BTech CS
2014.text: Learned JS basics for Unity. Worked day and night on Unity 3d for FPS game.

2014.title: Joined Amdocs
2014.text: Worked with diverse group of people from multiple countries, including Chile, US, Canada, India and many more.

2018.title: Left Amdocs, moved to Techl33t
2018.text: Had a really great time in a start with college friends, learned a lot about development from them. Angular, Node, Python, Django, Laravel – PHP, Ionic 3 and so on.

2018.title: Joined Cropin
2018.text: Another milestone, became a senior frontend engineer, worked on leaflet - interactive maps-based projects.

2019.title: Gave my first talk
2019.text: Gave a demo on how to use leaflet and how to architect Angular project.

2019.title: Meet with i3
2019.text: Long time Linux user tried my hands with i3 window manager. Tried ricing and made it my daily driver for couple of upcoming months.

2020.title: Sr. software engineer at Legato health
2020.text: Got more hands on with react, react native, bundlers like webpack 5, Nextjs, storybook, node, Strapi CMS and don’t know what else.
